title: Why Is Trump Pardoning Texas Democrat Henry Cuellar?
description: President Trump has pardoned Democratic Congressman Henry Cueller, alleging he was targeted by the Biden administration over his opposition to Biden’s border policies.
content: In an surprise move, President Donald Trump has announced that he is pardoning Henry Cuellar, a Democratic congressman from Texas indicted last year on federal corruption charges. In a TruthSocial po… [+4468 chars]
